mapper.select: select ID, NAME, INTRODUCE, PHONE, DELIVERY_AREA_GUIDE IFNULL(ss.FROM_DATETIME, NOW()) SUSPENSION_FROM, IFNULL(ss.TO_DATETIME, NOW()) SUSPENSION_TO FROM SHOP S JOIN CATEGORY_SHOP CS ON CS.CATEGORY_ID = ${id} JOIN BUSINESS_HOUR BH ON S.ID = BH.SHOP_ID LEFT JOIN SHOP_SUSPENSION SS ON S.ID = SS.SHOP_ID WHERE S.ID = CS.SHOP_ID AND S.ID NOT IN (SELECT SHOP_IDFROM CLOSING_DAY WHERE DAY_OF_WEEK = #{dayOfWeek}) AND S.EXPOSED = TRUE
